name: diffichain
description: Confidential token launchpad with zero-knowledge proofs

scripts.build: npm run build:circuits && npm run build:contracts && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:circuits
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd contracts && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --rpc-url https://testnet1.monad.xyz --broadcast --verify
scripts.clean: npm run clean:contracts && npm run clean:circuits && npm run clean:frontend
